content: @Michael Levy, can you please point @SBachman to a recent MOM6 caseroot with MARBL? He's trying to compile with MARBL on in a regional configuration.

Chiming in for @Michael Levy, as he is out of the office.
CASEROOT=/glade/work/mlevy/codes/CESM/cesm2_3_beta08+mom6_marbl/long_runs/g.e23b08.TL319_t061.G1850MOMMARBL_JRA.002
MOM code, with MARBL, is at
/glade/work/mlevy/codes/CESM/cesm2_3_beta08+mom6_marbl/components/mom/MOM6
MARBL is in the subdirectory pkg/MARBL
I think Mike also has changes to MOM_interface, the parent of the above directory, for building MOM+MARBL within CESM.
I'm not sure if Mike has built standalone MOM+MARBL.

Thanks for providing the info, Keith! I have not built standalone MOM+MARBL - one of my lower-priority tasks is to figure out how to point the stand-alone build system to $MOM_ROOT/pkg/MARBL (actual MARBL code) instead of $MOM_ROOT/config_src/external/MARBL (a template that will allow $MOM_ROOT/src/tracer/MARBL_tracers.F90 to build but will abort if USE_MARBL_TRACERS=True)
I don't think @SBachman is using standalone MOM6...
@Matt Long I think you're right, if memory serves he mentioned that he's using CESM+MOM last time we all discussed this. (One of many reasons that standalone MOM+MARBL is such a low priority)
